name: Guess We'll Have Another Scrap, You Can Only Risk Death While You're Still Alive!!!
text:
Main You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader is [Gol.D.Roger] and you have any given DON!! cards, add up to 1 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest it. 
Counter Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.
